headline: Optimism for Trade Desk (TTD) Following Solid Results Preview
summary: Trade Desk (NASDAQ:TTD) is one of the best large cap stocks under $100 with huge upside potential. On January 23, Mark Kelley from Stifel Nicolaus maintained his Buy rating on Trade Desk (NASDAQ:TTD), while lowering his estimated target price from $90 to $74. headline: Trade Desk CFO Turnover Puts Spotlight On Leadership Stability And Growth
summary: The Trade Desk (NasdaqGM:TTD) announced the abrupt departure of CFO Alex Kayyal after less than six months in the role. Longtime executive Tahnil Davis has been appointed interim CFO, marking a second finance leadership change in under half a year. The moves come during a period of sector pressure and a maturing digital advertising market. The leadership shake up lands at a sensitive time for The Trade Desk, with the share price at $32.19 and the stock showing a 5.7% decline over the past...
